Package org.bluezoo.gumdrop.imap

Class IMAPServerMetrics

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.bluezoo.gumdrop.imap.IMAPServerMetrics
  • public class IMAPServerMetrics
extends java.lang.Object
    OpenTelemetry metrics for IMAP servers.

    This class provides standardized IMAP server metrics for monitoring mail access operations.

    Metrics provided:

    • imap.server.connections - Total number of IMAP connections
    • imap.server.active_connections - Number of active connections
    • imap.server.commands - Commands executed by type
    • imap.server.command.duration - Command execution duration
    • imap.server.session.duration - Session duration in milliseconds
    • imap.server.authentications - Authentication attempts
    • imap.server.messages.fetched - Messages fetched
    • imap.server.idle_connections - Connections in IDLE state
    Author:
    Chris Burdess
